subject: Can I know the affiliate program commission
description_text: Can I know the affiliate program commission payment schedule?

conversations.body_text: Hi Anh Ngo,    We will disburse the previous month's commission at the beginning of each month. As we are in a long holiday period during early October, the commissions for September and October will be settled together in early November.

Oh so you don't have a 30 day return policy?


Vào Th 2, 27 thg 10, 2025 lúc 14:06 service@simsonn.com

Hi Anh Ngo,    We operate a 30-day returns policy. However, we do not extend commission payments, as our return rate is low and we have historically overlooked this portion of losses.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Given the recent increase in order volume, we should indeed be mindful of this matter. We shall discuss this with our manager and may subsequently delay commission payments by one month. Should any changes occur, we shall update the affiliate programme details accordingly.

okk happy cooperation, but are you sure after waiting for 1 month to wait
for approval, will you still pay me?


Vào Th 2, 27 thg 10, 2025 lúc 14:18 service@simsonn.com

Hi Anh Ngo,    Of course, our system tracks monthly sales figures. However, we must clarify that our minimum payment threshold is $60. If this threshold is not met, we will hold the commission payment until the following month when the threshold is reached.

If I create commissions in November will I receive them in December?
Vào Th 2, 27 thg 10, 2025 lúc 16:20 service@simsonn.com

I had a commission due in November but haven't received payment this month.
